channel.title: Nightmare Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Nightmare Village" - We only need a few players around 6 or so so we can build the potion place so come on and join, we accept all levels of players

item.title: Re: Nightmare Village
item.content:encoded:
6 monsters now fought off we only need a few players to buy the potion palace next
Come and join thr randomness

item.title: Re: Nightmare Village
item.content:encoded: Check out our Village page here 5 new upgrades have been bought and 3 monsters fought off

item.title: Nightmare Village
item.content:encoded:
Hi Cana here

I've reciently been appointed Kage of Nightmare village since our previous Kage as trouble accessing the internet
As such the village has fallen into disarray, I am now trying to revitilise the Village

So I'm looking for villagers of all ranks to come so we can reactivate our diabled upgrades and access new ones
We at the Nightmare village are a friendly helpful bunch so please if you join feel free to ramble on the message board someone will answer, and you may make a new friend

Thank you
Cana
